TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ComputerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于获取计算机内存、已加载程序集、名称和操作系统相关信息的属性。

span.span: Provides properties for getting information about the computer's memory, loaded assemblies, name, and operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的属性`My.Computer.Info`对象返回有关从中部署该应用程序，该计算机的信息，如在运行时确定。The properties exposed by the `My.Computer.Info` object return information about the computer from which the application is deployed, as determined at run time. 通常情况下，此数据不同于开发计算机上可用。Typically, this data differs from what was available on the development computer. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`属性显示的代码在其上运行的计算机的可用物理内存量。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property to display the amount of available physical memory for the computer on which the code runs. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailablePhysicalMemory As ULong
public: property System::UInt64 AvailablePhysicalMemory { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 获取计算机的可用物理内存总量。

span.span: Gets the total amount of free physical memory for the computer.

value.span: 一个 值，包含计算机的可用物理内存的字节数。

span.span: A containing the number of bytes of free physical memory for the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`属性，则需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista。The `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`属性显示的代码在其上运行的计算机的可用物理内存量。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property to display the amount of available physical memory for the computer on which the code runs. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 应用程序无法获取内存状态。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the memory status.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableVirtualMemory As ULong
public: property System::UInt64 AvailableVirtualMemory { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 获取计算机的可用虚拟地址空间的总量。

span.span: Gets the total amount of the computer's free virtual address space.

value.span: 一个 值，包含计算机的可用虚拟地址空间的字节数。

span.span: A containing the number of bytes of the computer's free virtual address space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory`属性，则需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista。The `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory`属性显示的代码在其上运行的计算机的可用虚拟内存量。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory` property to display the amount of available virtual memory for the computer on which the code runs. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 应用程序无法获取内存状态。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the memory status.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstalledUICulture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ InstalledUICulture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取随操作系统安装的当前用户界面区域性。

span.span: Gets the current UI culture installed with the operating system.

value.span: 表示在计算机上安装的 UI 区域性的 对象。

span.span: A object represents the UI culture installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture`属性具有相同的行为属性。The `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture` property has the same behavior as the property. 在本地化操作系统，如日语 Windows 2000 Professional，此属性返回的操作系统的区域性。In a localized operating system, such as Japanese Windows 2000 Professional, this property returns the culture of the operating system. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture`属性来显示操作系统的 UI 区域性的名称。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture` property to display the name of the operating system's UI culture. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OSFullName As String
public: property System::String ^ OSFullName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the full operating system name.

value.span: 一个 值，包含操作系统名称。

span.span: A containing the operating-system name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果计算机上安装 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)，此属性将返回有关操作系统名称的详细的信息。This property returns detailed information about the operating system name if Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) is installed on the computer. 否则，此属性返回的字符串不同`My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`属性，用于提供不是 WMI 可提供更少详细信息。Otherwise, this property returns the same string as the `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property, which provides less detailed information than WMI can provide. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.OSFullName`属性来显示计算机的名称的操作系统。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSFullName` property to display the name of the computer's operating system. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

exception.span: 调用代码没有完全信任权限。

span.span: The calling code does not have full trust.

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OSPlatform As String
public: property System::String ^ OSPlatform { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取计算机的操作系统的平台标识符。

span.span: Gets the platform identifier for the operating system of the computer.

value.span: 一个包含计算机操作系统的平台标识符的 ，此字符串是从 枚举的成员名称中选择的。

span.span: A containing the platform identifier for the operating system of the computer, chosen from the member names of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`属性提供的功能类似于属性返回的对象属性。The `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property provides functionality similar to the property of the object returned by the property. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`属性来显示计算机的平台的操作系统。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property to display the platform of the computer's operating system. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

exception.span: 应用程序无法获取操作系统平台信息。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the operating-system platform information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OSVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ OSVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取计算机操作系统的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the computer's operating system.

value.span: 一个 值，包含操作系统的当前版本号。

span.span: A containing the current version number of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`属性设置格式的"major.minor.build.revision"形式的版本。The `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property formats the version as "major.minor.build.revision". `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`属性提供的功能类似于属性返回的对象属性。The `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property provides functionality similar to the property of the object returned by the property. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`属性来显示计算机的版本的操作系统。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property to display the version of the computer's operating system. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

exception.span: 应用程序无法获取操作系统版本信息。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the operating-system version information.
